instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Ensure Tailwind config includes the custom colors (obsidian: #050505, midnight: #0A2472) and fonts (Space Grotesk, Inter).
2. BACKGROUND: The HTML body MUST have 'bg-[#050505]' and 'text-slate-50'. Do NOT use gray-900.
3. HERO: Create a 'Tracing Beam' effect or a subtle radial gradient glow (blue-900/20) behind the hero text to make it pop against the black.
4. CONSOLE CARDS: Use the Glassmorphism style. The Wii U card is ACTIVE (clickable, full opacity). The 3DS card is 'Coming Soon' (opacity-50, grayscale, non-clickable cursor-not-allowed).
5. LANGUAGE: All visible text MUST be in French. (e.g., 'Commencer le guide', 'Mise Ã  jour', 'Support Discord').
6. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure blue text on black has sufficient contrast. Use lighter blues (blue-400) for text, darker blues for backgrounds.
7. NO BORDERS: Avoid thick borders. Use 'border-white/5' or 'border-white/10' for subtle separation.
8. TESTING: Add data-testid to the 'Start Guide' button and Console Cards.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic centered layouts without texture.
Texture: Add a subtle noise overlay if possible to the background to reduce banding on pure black.
Gradients: Use gradients for TEXT or BORDERS, not for main backgrounds.
Spacing: Use generous padding (py-24, py-32) for sections.
